import React from 'react'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { FiImage, FiEye, FiDownload, FiUpload, FiUser, FiMail } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const DashboardPage = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const { data: stats, isLoading } = useQuery('mediaStats', async () => { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/media/stats'); return response.data; }); const { data: recentMedia } = useQuery('recentMedia', async () => { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/media?limit=5'); return response.data; }); const formatFileSize = (bytes) => { if (bytes === 0) return '0 Bytes'; const k = 1024; const sizes = ['Bytes', 'KB', 'MB', 'GB']; const i = Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(k)); return Math.round(bytes / Math.pow(k, i) * 100) / 100 + ' ' + sizes[i]; }; if (isLoading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {user?.name}!

Here's what's happening with your media gallery.

{/* Stats Grid */}

Total Media

{stats?.stats?.totalMedia || 0}

Total Views

{stats?.stats?.totalViews || 0}

Total Downloads

{stats?.stats?.totalDownloads || 0}

Storage Used

{formatFileSize(stats?.stats?.totalSize || 0)}

{/* Recent Uploads */}

Recent Uploads

{recentMedia?.media && recentMedia.media.length > 0 ? (
{recentMedia.media.map((media) => (

{media.title}

{new Date(media.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

{media.views} views â€¢ {media.downloads} downloads View
))}
) : (

No media yet

Get started by uploading your first image.

Upload Media
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Upload Media

Add new images to your gallery

View Gallery

Browse and manage your media

Contact Support

Get help or send feedback

); }; export default DashboardPage;
